name: Wine and Song

refinement_effect.refine_one: For every character in the party who hails from Mondstadt, the character who equips this weapon gains 8% ATK increase and 3% Movement SPD increase.
refinement_effect.refine_two: For every character in the party who hails from Mondstadt, the character who equips this weapon gains 10% ATK increase and 3.5% Movement SPD increase.
refinement_effect.refine_three: For every character in the party who hails from Mondstadt, the character who equips this weapon gains 12% ATK increase and 4% Movement SPD increase.
refinement_effect.refine_four: For every character in the party who hails from Mondstadt, the character who equips this weapon gains 14% ATK increase and 4.5% Movement SPD increase.
refinement_effect.refine_five: For every character in the party who hails from Mondstadt, the character who equips this weapon gains 16% ATK increase and 5% Movement SPD increase.

description: A songbook from the bygone aristocratic era, whose composer has become forgotten. It chronicles the tale of a certain heroic outlaw.
